This comment element has no effect whatsoever and is only there for documentation purposes. Let's talk about the Trigger: Most important is the Trigger Type. This event can be triggered whenever a NEXTDAY event occurs. Next is one row of controls for requirements and then the requirements themselfes. You can use mouseclicks (for example on the outer And) to get a better feel for what each requirement encompasses.
The first 'And requirement' encompasses several sub requirements. All those requirements have to be met for this event to trigger.
First of the three is an OrRequirement: Either it has be day 100, 200, 300 ... or alternatively it can be day 10, 20, 30, 40... and a 5% chance has to be met Second is a not requirement. It basically says: None of the owned characters is allowed to have the Businessrelations trait. That is because Businessrelations grants permanent access to the travelling merchant, so this event becomes meaningless and potentially annoying. Last is the requirement that it has to be later than day 99 (to allow for triggering on day 100), which prevents the event to potentially trigger on days 10, 20 ... and only allows it on day 100, 110, 120 ...

jasbro.game.world.customContent.effects..message: A travelling merchant arrives in town. You get the opportunity to buy a few rare items.
